short_description_localized.en: Contemporary style and warm tones. Located on the second floor. Kitchenette and free WiFi.

description_localized.en: Contemporary style and warm tones. Located on the second floor. Kitchenette, full size sleeper sofa and free WiFi, 284 sq. ft.

images.description: This suite includes a queen bed, TV, and a window.
images.alt: A comfortable queen size bed nestled to the left of a nightstand accompanied by a lamp and clock radio. To the left of the bed a window sitting just to the right of a TV fixed to the wall.
